title: James E. Scarboro Scholarship Endowment Fund
description: Scholarship support for students in the Law School at CU Boulder who embody the spirit of Jim Scarboro with special consideration for those with commitment to the State of Colorado and public service and to professional responsibility and legal ethics.
marketingContent: Scholarship support for students in the Law School at CU Boulder who embody the spirit of Jim Scarboro with special consideration for those with commitment to the State of Colorado and public service and to professional responsibility and legal ethics.
